有的效果能够赋予角色暂时生命值。
Certain feats, let a character take special actions in combat.
特定的专长，将由角色在战斗中执行特殊动作。
Challenge Rating: A heroic supporting character has a Challenge Rating equal to his or her character level.
挑战等级：英雄非玩家角色的挑战等级等于其角色等级。
Changing a filter is a move action.
换罐需要一个移动动作。
Characters apply their Dexterity modifier to Defense.
角色的敏捷调整值将应用于防御值。
Characters bound with duct tape must make a Strength or Escape Artist check (DC 20) to free themselves.
被胶带束缚的角色必须做一个力量或脱逃检定以挣脱（DC20）。
Characters breathing heavy smoke or similar toxic gases must make a Constitution check (DC 10, +1 for each previous check) each round or spend that round choking and coughing.
吸入浓烟或类似毒性气体的角色必须每轮都进行一次体质检定（DC10，每次检定后+1），失败则呛气咳嗽。
Characters jailed for crimes can seek bail.
被囚禁的角色可以寻求保释。
Characters who are fatigued can’t run or charge and take a penalty of –2 to Strength and Dexterity.
角色无法奔跑或冲锋，力量和敏捷各有两点减值。
Characters who are nauseated are unable to attack or do anything else requiring attention or concentration.
反胃的角色无法攻击，也无法做任何需要集中注意力的动作。
Characters who choke for 2 consecutive rounds take 1d6 points of damage.
连续两轮呛气的角色将会受到1d6点伤害。
Charging is a special full-round action that allows a character to move more than his or her speed and attack during the action.
冲锋时一种特殊的整轮动作，角色可以在这个动作中以超过常速的速度移动并攻击。
Charging requires one Balance check at a –5 penalty for each multiple of the character’s speed (or fraction thereof) that the character charges.
冲锋时，每一倍于常速（超而未满向上取整）都要进行一次带5点减值的平衡检定。
Check the skill description to find out if, and under what circumstances, a character can try again.
检查技能描述看是否可以，以及何种情况允许重试。
Check with your GM before selecting an advanced class.
选择一个高级职业前应该和GM沟通好。
Checks are required during combat, for special maneuvers, or in other extreme circumstances, or when the pilot wants to attempt something outside the normal parameters of the vehicle.
只有在战斗中、特殊机动操作、或者其他极端情况下，或是驾驶员需要超常发挥载具机能时需要检定。
Children (newborns to age 11) are handled differently from other characters.
儿童（新生儿到11岁）的机制与其他角色不同。
Children have 1d4 hit points plus their Constitution modifier (minimum 1 hit point).
儿童有1d4+体质调整值的生命值（至少1点）。
Children have a +0 modifier to Defense and a normal speed of 20 feet.
儿童的防御有0点调整值，有20尺的基础移动速度。
Children have a Challenge Rating of 0, and heroes receive no experience points for “defeating” them.
儿童的挑战等级为0，英雄“打败”他们不会获得任何经验值。
Children have no effective attacks and should be treated as noncombatants.
儿童没有攻击效果，应视为非战斗人员。
Choose a specific weapon.
选定一种武器。
Choose a weapon type from the following list: cannons, heavy machine guns, grenade launchers, and rocket launchers.
从下列武器类型选择一种：加农炮、重机枪、榴弹发射器和火箭筒。
Choose one exotic melee weapon from.
选择一种异种近战武器。
Choose one light melee weapon, a rapier (if the character can use it with one hand), or a chain.
选择一个轻型近战武器、细剑（角色需单手就能使用）或者锁链。
Choose one occupation from the available selections and apply the benefits to the character as noted in the occupation’s description.
从以下职业背景中选择自己角色的职业背景，获得相应的奖励。
Circumstance bonuses stack only if they’re provided by differing circumstances; if two circumstance bonuses caused by similar circumstances apply, they don’t stack.
不同的情景提供的加值可叠加；两个情景加值若由相似的情景提供，则不可叠加。
Circumstances dramatically affect the effectiveness of an Intimidate check.
DM应根据情境调整威吓检定的效果使其更合理。

攀爬用绳索能承受至多1000磅的重量。

衣物同样可以隐藏枪械、躯干护甲以及细小物件。

衣物在游戏机制上通常有两个作用：一个是易容检定，另一个是手上功夫检定。

外套：上身穿的外装。
Cold attacks deal one-quarter damage to most objects; divide the damage by 4 before applying the hardness.
寒冷攻击对大多数物品造成1/4伤；造成的伤害在扣除硬度之前先除以4。
Collecting evidence generally takes 1d4 minutes per object.
收集证据每一件通常需要1d4分钟。
Collecting evidence requires an evidence kit.
收集证据需要取证工具。
Com-bat usually runs in the following way.
战斗按照以下顺序进行：
Combat is played out in rounds, and in each round everybody acts in turn in a regular cycle.
战斗是循环的，每个人都在一个正常轮组成的循环中轮流行动。
Combatants act in initiative order.
作战者按先攻顺序行动。
Combatants who are unaware at the start of battle do not get to act in the surprise round.
那些没觉察到敌人的作战者在突袭轮中不能做动作。
Combatants who have not yet rolled initiative do so.
还没有投过先攻的作战者投先攻。
Combatants who were unaware don’t get to act in the surprise round.
那些没觉察到敌人的作战者在突袭轮中不能做动作。
Committing to a Full Attack Action: A character doesn’t have to commit to a full attack until after the first attack.
决定要全力攻击：角色不需要一开始就决定全力攻击，
Compensation can be a favor in return or something appropriate to the creature in question.
这些报酬可以是偿还人情，或者是这种生物需要的东西。
Complete bed rest (24 hours) restores 2 points per day.
全天休养（24小时）每天恢复2点。
Complex messages or messages trying to communicate new information have DCs of 15 or 20.
复杂的信息或者试图交流新的信息将会有15或20的DC。

Concealable armor can be worn under clothing if the wearer wants it to go unnoticed.
如果穿着护甲的人不想引人注目，隐藏护甲可以穿在衣服内。
Concealable armor is modern body armor designed to fit underneath regular clothing.
隐藏护甲是专为隐藏于便服之下而设计的现代护甲。
Concealed Carry: A concealed carry holster is designed to help keep a weapon out of sight (see Concealed Weapons and Objects).
隐藏装具：隐藏的装具专为隐藏武器而设计（详见`隐藏的武器与物品`）。
Concealment always depends on the point of view of the attacker.
隐藏总是取决于攻击方的视野。
Concealment gives the subject of a successful attack a chance that the attacker missed because of the concealment.
隐藏会让成功发起攻击的一方有一定几率因隐藏而失手。
Concealment includes all circumstances in which nothing physically blocks a blow or shot, but something interferes with an attacker’s accuracy.
隐藏涵盖了所有除物理阻隔因素外，干扰攻击方精度的情况。
Concealment is subjectively measured as to how well concealed the defender is.
隐藏度是防御方隐藏得多好的主观估值。

相反，小型或更小体型的生物会因其体型处于劣势。

接触腐蚀性的酸液每轮都会造成伤害。

掩蔽和隐藏会为躲藏提供情景加值，见下文。

掩蔽度是掩蔽所能提供保护程度的主观估值。

相比于轻型衬甲，能保护更大的面积，提供更好的防护——但也更容易暴露。

Craft skills are specifically focused on creating objects.
制造技能着重于创造物品。
Crashing a computer simply shuts it down.
`使电脑崩溃`就是单单关掉电脑而已。
Creating a plan requires 1 minute.
制定计划需要一分钟的时间。
Creating a work of visual art requires at least a full-round action, but usually takes an hour, a day, or more, depending on the scope of the project.
创作一件视觉艺术需要至少一个整轮动作，但通常需要花费一小时、一天甚至更多，取决于项目的工程量。
Creating a work of writing requires at least 1 hour, but usually takes a day, a week, or more, depending on the scope of the project.
创作一篇文字需要至少一小时，但通常需要花费一天、一周甚至更多，取决于项目的工作量。
Creature size categories are defined differently from the size categories for weapons and other objects.
生物的体型与武器及其他物品的尺寸不是一个概念。
Creature sizes are compatible with vehicle sizes.
生物的体型可与载具的体型是一个概念，将参与对抗计算。
Creatures immune to critical hits are also immune to the effects of massive damage.
免疫重击的生物也会免疫巨创。

Creatures that are one size category smaller than the character count as one-half creature each; creatures that are one size category larger than the character count as two creatures; and creatures two or more size categories larger than the character count as four creatures.
体型比目标低一级的生物算半个，体型比目标高一级的生物算两个，高大于等于两级的生物算4个。
Creatures that would be turned are rebuked instead, and those that would be destroyed are commanded.
本是驱散的效果改为斥喝，本是摧毁的效果改为命令。
Creatures tracking by scent ignore the effects of surface conditions and poor visibility.
但用嗅觉追踪无视路况和低能见度的效果。
Creatures with cover get a bonus on their Reflex save.
在掩蔽后的生物的反射豁免会得到一个加值。
Creatures with natural poison attacks are immune to their own poison.
天然拥有毒性攻击的生物免疫它们自己的毒性。
Creatures with the scent ability can identify familiar odors just as humans do familiar sights.
拥有灵敏嗅觉的生物能识别熟悉的气味，像人类辨认出熟悉的景象一样。
Cutting the fuse to the appropriate length requires a move action.
将导火索裁减到合适长度需要一个移动动作。
DCs are given below.
DC如下。
DCs for the ability check depend on the level of the power: 0-level, DC 11; 1st-level, DC 13; 2nd-level, DC 15; and 3rd-level, DC 17.
属性检定的DC取决于灵力等级：0级的DC为11，1级DC13，2级DC15、3级DC17。
Damage equals that of a normal creature of its type.
伤害等于同类型生物的一般伤害。
Damage from thirst or starvation cannot be recovered until the hero gets water or food, as needed.
饥饿与口渴造成的伤害无法恢复，直到主角获得水或食物。
Damage is deducted from the target’s current hit points.
目标的当前生命值将扣除此次造成的伤害值。
Damage the Opponent: Make an opposed grapple check; if the character succeeds, he or she deals damage as with an un-armed strike.

但这种声音是无法分辨声源的，需要做一个聆听检定（DC15）来确认枪火的来源。
However, most revolvers can be used with a speed loader.
但大多数转轮枪都能用快速装弹器装弹。
However, ordinaries differ from heroes in several ways.
但是，路人有几点与英雄不同。

However, searching an unfamiliar network for a particular file, writing computer programs, altering existing programs to perform differently (better or worse), and breaking through computer security are all relatively difficult and require skill checks.
然而，在一个不熟悉的网络环境里搜索特定的文件、编写计算机程序、修改现存的程序以改变其性能（优化或者劣化）、以及攻破计算机的安全系统等等相对困难的计算机操作需要此技能检定。
However, sometimes all a character wants to do is grab the target.
但是，有时候角色仅仅只是想攫抓住目标。
However, the GM can impose limits depending on circumstances and a given situation.
然而，GM可以根据实际情况强行限制。
However, the GM puts reasonable limits on what a character can really do for free.
但GM将对角色真正能做的即时动作做出合理的限制。
However, the bulky suit imposes a penalty of –4 on all Dexterity checks, Dexterity-based skill checks (except Hide), and melee attack rolls.
但这种庞大的套装会给所有敏捷检定、基于敏捷的技能检定（除了躲藏）、以及近战攻击骰带来4点减值。）
However, the character doesn’t get this higher Strength bonus when using a light weapon two-handed; in such a case, only the character’s normal Strength bonus applies to the damage roll.
但该规则不适用于双手使用一把轻武器；这种情形下，伤害骰只能应用一倍力量加值。
However, the character gets a +2 bonus to Defense against ranged attacks while running.
但角色奔跑时，对远程攻击的防御会获得2点加值。
However, the character might make a check to wend his or her way through a dense forest or a labyrinth of underground storm drains.
而角色在茂密的丛林、迷宫或者下水道行进时需要进行此检定。
However, the character receives a –2 penalty on his or her attack roll, and the character’s attack deals –1 die of damage.
但是，角色的攻击骰有2点减值，伤害骰有1点减值。
However, the checks you make to determine whether you are successful at activating the item take no time by themselves and are included in the activate magic item attack action.
而启动物品成功与否的检定花掉的时间算在这个攻击动作里。
However, the real obstacles to ownership are time and money; anyone with sufficient patience and cash can eventually acquire the necessary license.
然而拥有它的资格只是时间和钱的问题，只要有耐心和钱，总会获得执照的。
However, the skill employed in Search, and the searcher gets a +4 circumstance bonus for the hands-on act of frisking the target.
但搜身需要做的是`搜索检定`，搜身者由于是用手摸索，将获得4点情景加值。
However, there are tight restrictions on how and when a character can charge.
但执行这个动作的时机和条件都很苛刻。
However, this only applies to the target struck, not to other objects within the burst radius.
但这只对正中的目标生效，爆炸范围波及的其他目标无效。
However, to use a scope a character must spend an attack action acquiring his or her target.
但使用瞄准镜需要用一个攻击动作瞄准目标。
Humans normally move 30 feet, although armor can slow a character down.
人类一般能移动30尺，但护甲会减慢角色的速度。
Humans normally move 30 feet, but some creatures move faster or slower.
人类一般能移动30尺，而一些生物移动得更快或更慢。
Identification: If you distribute Open Game Content You must clearly indicate which portions of the work that you are distributing are Open Game Content.
标识：如果你分发了OGC你必须清楚地指出你正在分发的这部分工作成果是OGC。
Identifying the intruder requires 1 minute and is a separate check from cutting off access.
识别入侵者需要1分钟的时间，对抗检定与切断访问的对抗检定不是同一个。
If A character sells an object with a sale value less than or equal to his or her current Wealth bonus, and that sale value is 14 or lower, the character gains nothing.
如果角色出售了售价小于等于角色当前财富加值的物品，且售价小于等于14，角色不会增加任何财富值。
If a bribe isn’t requires, a hero can add a bribe to get a bonus on his or her skill check.
如果不需要贿赂，英雄可以附加贿赂来为交涉技能检定提供加值。
If a character can’t react to a blow, that character can’t use his or her Dexterity bonus to Defense.
若角色无法对攻击做出反应则无法在防御中算上敏捷加值。
If a character does something that requires a full round, he or she can only take a 5-foot step.
若角色做了一个非移动的整轮动作，则只能同时做一次五尺快步。
If a character fails on a skill check, he or she can sometimes try again.
如果角色技能检定失败，有时可以再试一次。
If a character fires a blast of automatic fire at a specific target without the Burst Fire feat, it’s treated as a standard attack.
如果角色没有点射专长，又要对指定目标进行自动射击，此次攻击将算作一次标准攻击。

If a character gets more than one attack per action because his or her base attack bonus is high enough, because he or she fights with two weapons, because he or she is using a double weapon, or for some special reason, the character must use the full attack action to get his or her additional attacks.
如果角色的基础攻击加值足够高、或是使用双持武器以及双头武器、或是特殊原因，可以让每个动作攻击多次，角色必须使用全力攻击来执行额外的攻击。
If a character gets multiple attacks based on his or her base attack bonus, the character must make the attacks in order from highest bonus to lowest.
如果角色因其基础攻击加值进行了多次攻击，角色必须按加值从高到低的顺序进行这些攻击。
If a character has a base attack bonus of +1 or higher, the character can draw a weapon as a free action when moving.
如果角色的基础攻击加值至少有1点，则可以在移动的同时以一个即时动作拔出武器。
If a character is attacking with a ranged weapon and is not adjacent to the target, the character can use a full-round action to make the attack, and gain a +5 bonus on the attack roll.
若角色以远程武器攻击，且未与目标相邻，角色可以用一个整轮动作来攻击，攻击骰获得5点加值。
If a character is attempting to disarm the wielder of a melee weapon, follow the steps outlined here.
如果角色尝试卸除近战武器，应遵循以下步骤。
If a character is making a melee attack against an opponent, and an ally directly opposite the character is threatening the opponent, the character and his or her ally flank the opponent.
若角色正对一个目标发起近战攻击，同时对面有一个盟友正威胁着该目标，则角色与盟友`夹击`了该目标。
If a character isn’t proficient in personal firearms, he or she takes a –4 penalty on attacks with that type of weapon.
若角色不擅长单兵枪械，用对应武器的攻击骰将承受4点减值。
If a character loses an action due to delaying, he or she may act on any count on the next turn.
若角色因延迟丧失行动机会，则可在下一轮以任何先攻值行动。
If a character moves no actual distance in a round, that character can take one 5-foot step before, during, or after the action.
如果角色在一轮内没有任何移动，角色可以在动作前、动作时、动作后做一个`五尺快步`移动。
If a character spends a point to use a class feature, he or she can’t spend another one in the same round to improve a die roll, and vice versa.
用了行动点发动角色专长就不能再用行动点增强投骰了，反之亦然。
If a character takes this kind of move action during his or her turn, the character cannot also take a 5-foot step.
如果角色在回合内进行了这样的移动，则不可进行五尺快步。

If a character uses a full-round action to make an attack against an inanimate, immobile object, the character gets an automatic hit with a melee weapon, or a +5 bonus on his or her attack roll with a ranged weapon.
如果角色用一个整轮动作攻击一个无生命的、固定的物体，以近战武器攻击必然命中，以远程武器攻击，攻击骰由5点加值。
If a character uses his or her attack action as a move action, the character can move again (for a total movement of up to twice the character’s normal speed).
若角色将攻击动作作为移动动作使用，角色可以再移动一次（总计移动了两倍于速度的距离）。
If a character uses the chain as a reach weapon, he or she can strike opponents up to 10 feet away.
角色如果将其作为长型武器使用，则可攻击10尺内的对手。
If a character wears armor, it provides a bonus to his or her Defense.
角色穿着护甲也能提供防御加值。
If a character's Constitution changes enough to alter his or her Constitution modifier, his or her hit points also increase or decrease accordingly at the same time.
角色的生命值受到体质调整值的影响，若体质属性值变化足够引起体质调整值的变化，则该角色生命值亦将随即发生变化。
If a character’s Dexterity is high, he or she is particularly adept at dodging blows or gunfire.
高敏捷意味着角色能熟练地闪避击打和枪械射击。
If a character’s Dexterity is low, he or she is particularly inept at it.
低敏捷则意味着角色在这方面十分笨拙。
If a character’s Wealth bonus is +0, the character doesn’t have the buying power to purchase any object or service that has a purchase DC of 10 or higher, and can’t take 10 or take 20.
如果角色的财富加值是0，角色无力购买任何DC大于等于10的物品或服务，也不能取10取20。
If a hero’s clothes or hair catch fire, he or she takes 1d6 points of damage immediately.
如果英雄的衣服或头发着火，会立即损失1d6点生命。
If a mastercraft +2 object could be found for purchase, its cost would add +6 to the normal purchase DC.
如果+2的大师级工艺物品能买到，购买DC比一般的多6。

If a negative level is not removed before 24 hours have passed, the afflicted opponent must attempt a Fortitude save with a DC of 10 + 1/2 draining creature’s HD + draining creature’s Charisma modifier (the exact DC is given in the creature’s Species Traits).
如果负向等级在24小时期满前未被移除，受害者必须进行一个强韧豁免，DC=10+1/2吸取者生命骰+吸取者的魅力调整值（除非生物的物种特性另有规定）。
If a ranged weapon has an automatic rate of fire, a character may set it on autofire.
如果远程武器有自动射击模式，角色可以将武器设为自动模式。
If a skill is a class skill for any of a multiclass hero’s classes, then use character level to determine a skill’s maximum rank.
若技能是一个职业技能，且跨职英雄有这个职业，则可用角色等级决定该技能的级数上限。
If a skill the character selects is already a class skill, he or she receives a +1 competence bonus on checks using that skill.
若所选的技能已经是本职技能，该技能检定时获得+1表现加值。

If an Infiltrator of 4th level or higher is exposed to any effect that normally allows a character to attempt a Reflex saving throw for half damage, the Infiltrator suffers no damage if he or she makes a successful saving throw and only half damage on a failed save.
四级及以上的渗透者在反射豁免成功后，伤害不再减半，而是全免；豁免失败也能拥有伤害减半的效果。
If an attack that causes ability damage scores a critical hit, it deals twice the given amount (if the damage is expressed as a die range, roll two dice).
如果造成暂时属性伤害的那次攻击产生了重击，伤害的点数加倍（如果伤害值是骰点而非定值，则扔两遍骰子而不是将结果加倍）。
If an attack that causes permanent ability drain scores a critical hit, it drains twice the given amount (if the damage is expressed as a die range, roll two dice).
如果造成永久属性吸取的那次攻击产生了重击，吸取的点数加倍（如果伤害值是骰点而非定值，则扔两遍骰子而不是将结果加倍）。
If an attack that includes an energy drain scores a critical hit, it drains double the given amount.
如果造成能量吸取的攻击产生了重击，吸取的值加倍。
If an attack will damage the character just by touching him or her, that character can’t add his or her equipment bonus (see Touch Attacks, below).
如果一次攻击仅通过接触攻击对角色造成伤害，角色不能算上装备加值（见下文`接触攻击`）。
If an attack will damage the character just by touching him or her, the character can’t add an equipment bonus (see Touch Attacks).
如果一次攻击仅通过接触攻击对角色造成伤害，角色不能算上装备加值（见`接触攻击`）。
If an aura falls into more than one strength category (for instance, if a creature and a magic item are in the same place and each emits an aura), the ability indicates the stronger of the two.
如果气场的来源可分（比如一个生物和一个魔法物品在同一位置，都散发气场），探查暗影探查到的是较强者。
If an aura is outside the Slayer’s line of sight, then he discerns its direction but not its exact location.
如果气场在暗影猎手视线外，暗影猎手只能感应到这个气场的方向，而不能感应位置。
If an object has lost half or more of its hit points, the DC to break it decreases by 2.
如果物品失去了一半及以上地生命值，破坏所需DC减2。
If any particular notes apply to trained or untrained use, they are covered in the Special section (see below).
如果技能的使用针对受训与未受训有特别的规则，将会在`特别`一项里阐明。
If at any time the target breaks free or slips free of the grapple, the stranglehold is broken (although any damage that was dealt remains).
任何时候目标脱离擒抱，扼喉就中止了（但之前造成的伤害仍然保持）。
If bail is granted, a character can arrange for a bail bond—a loan that covers bail.
角色如果被保释，将被授予保释保证书——相当于一种“欠条”。
If battery life is important in the game, roll 1d20 every time a battery-operated item is used.
如果电池寿命对于游戏很重要，每次使用电池驱动的设备都掷1d20。
If characters enter a battle after it has begun, they roll initiative at that time and act whenever their turn comes up in the existing order.
如果角色进入一场已经开始的战斗，他们将在加入时立即进行一次先攻检定，按检定结果插入队列中，并在轮到自己时行动。
If damage remains, the character may continue to make repairs for as many hours as it takes to restore all the object’s hit points.
如果仍有伤害，角色可以继续修理多个小时，直到完全恢复。
If fired against a target closer than 30 feet away, it does not arm and will not explode.
如果对30尺内的目标发射，它不会击发更不会爆炸。
If fired against a target closer than 40 feet away, it does not arm and will not explode.
如果对40尺内的目标发射，它不会击发更不会爆炸。

If he or she does this, he or she gains a free readied action that allows the Negotiator to make either a move or attack action if either side in the negotiation (other than the Negotiator) decides to start hostilities.
如果这么做了，谈判专家将允许准备一个移动或攻击动作，如果谈判双方（除了谈判专家）要做出敌意行为，这个动作将触发。
If he or she is unsuspecting, he or she generally gets only a Spot check after an hour of tailing.
若目标没有疑心，则通常只在尾随的1小时后进行一次侦察检定。
If it can act, it applies its Intelligence modifier to initiative checks instead of a Dexterity modifier.
如果这一生物仍能做出行动，则在计算先攻时使用智力调整值代替敏捷调整值。
If it can’t flee, it cowers (can take no actions, –2 penalty to Defense).
如果它们无法逃跑，就会处于畏缩状态（无法做任何动作且防御有2点减值）。

If it chooses to do the latter, it takes a –20 penalty on grapple checks but is not considered grappled itself; the creature does not lose its Dexterity bonus to Defense, still threatens an area, and can use its remaining attacks against other opponents.
如果选择后者，其擒抱检定将受到20点减值，但自己不会视为处于被擒抱状态；擒抱者此时防御不会失去敏捷调整值，仍然有威胁范围，并可使用其他的部位攻击其他对手。
If it doesn’t involve moving any distance, a character can combine it with a 5-foot step.
如果这个动作不会造成任何位移，角色可附带进行一次五尺快步。

If it ever becomes important to know whether the cover was actually struck by an incoming attack that misses the intended target, the GM should determine if the attack roll would have hit the protected target without the cover.
如果结果是击中掩蔽还是完全失手对于游戏来说很重要，GM应当判定该攻击是否命中了假定未受掩护的目标。
If it has mechanical or electronic components, a Techie of 2nd level or higher can get maximum performance out of it.
2级时，技师可将拥有机械或电气部件的物品性能提升至极限。
If it misses, it also misses the ally.
若未命中，友方也不会被命中。
If it moves within 5 feet of the source, the creature can pinpoint that source.
如果生物走进气味源5尺范围内，将能准确找到气味源的位置。
If it succeeds, it swallows its opponent and deals bite damage.
如果成功，它便吞噬它的猎物，并且对方受到啮咬伤害。
If it’s a trap, the character springs it.
如果是设陷，角色会被设备弹开。
If it’s important, the GM can distinguish between a bluff that fails because the target doesn’t believe it and one that fails because it asks too much of the target.
如果有必要，GM可以区分唬骗失败的原因到底是目标不相信还是要求太多。
If it’s some sort of sabotage, the character thinks the device is disabled, but it still works normally.
如果是某种破坏，角色会认为设备已经瘫痪，但设备实际上仍然正常运转。
If more than one condition affects a character, apply both if possible.
如果角色受到多个状态影响，如果可以的话，都应用之。
If more than one opponent is grappling the character, the grapple check result has to beat all their check results to escape.
如果角色被多个对手擒抱，擒抱检定必须胜过每一个对手的擒抱检定才能挣脱。
If multiple characters are delaying, the one with the highest initiative modifier (or highest Dexterity, in case of a tie) has the advantage.
如果多个角色选择延迟，拥有最高先攻调整值的角色（相同则比较敏捷）占优势。
If multiple enemies are already involved in the grapple, the character picks one against whom to make the opposed grapple check.
如果多个敌人处于该多人擒抱中，角色只能选择一个对象来做擒抱检定。
If no body of water is at hand, rolling on the ground or smothering the fire with blankets or the like permits the hero another save with a +4 bonus.
如果没人手上有水，在地上打滚或用毯子切断助燃条件或者类似的行为可以让主角的反射豁免有4点加值。
If no one or everyone is surprised, a surprise round does not occur.
如果没有人觉察到对方，或者所有人都彼此发现，那么没有突袭轮。
If no one or everyone starts the battle aware, there is no surprise round.
如果在战斗开始时没有人觉察到对方，或者所有人都彼此发现，那么没有突袭轮。
If no one tends to the stable character (see below), he or she remains unconscious for 1 hour, at which point he or she makes a Fortitude save (DC 20).
如果没人照料稳定的角色（见下文），角色会在一小时内继续昏迷，届时角色进行一次强韧豁免检定（DC20）。
If no saving throw is mentioned, none is allowed.
若未提及任何豁免骰，则不可豁免。
If not possible, apply only the most severe condition.
如果不可以，取最严重的那个。
If not, increase the purchase DC by as much as 5.
如果不是，将购买DC提高5点。
If not, no.
否则不会。
If one side or the other of a character’s body is covered, the character gets one-half cover.
若角色的半边得到掩蔽，角色将获得半掩蔽。
If others saw through the previous disguise, they are automatically treated as suspicious if the character assumes the same disguise again.
如果其他角色看穿了前一个易容，而角色仍以这副面容出现，将自动引起怀疑。
If penalties to damage bring the damage result below 1, a hit still deals 1 point of damage.
如果因为减值导致伤害值低于1，那么依然可以造成1点伤害。
If people are observing the character, even casually, he or she can’t hide.
如果有人注视着角色，即使不是刻意注视，角色就不能躲藏。
If some but not all of the combatants are aware of their opponents, a surprise round happens before regular rounds begin.
如果只有一部分作战者觉察到敌人，那么在作战的`正常轮`（regular round）开始前有一个突袭轮（surprise round）。
If successful, the Investigator combines eyewitness accounts with forensic evidence to develop a profile of the suspect’s method of operation.
检定成功则调查员可以联系所有证据还原出犯罪过程。
If successful, the character becomes disabled (see above).
如果成功，角色变为瘫痪（见上文）。
If successful, the eavesdropper realizes that a secret message is contained in the communication.
如果成功，偷听者会意识到交流中包含的密信。
If successful, you can perform a strenuous action without taking 1 point of damage.
如果检定成功，你可以做一个费力的动作而不会受到1点伤害。
If such a weapon is controlled from a location other than the driver’s position, a character can man that position and become the gunner.
如果武器的控制系统在驾驶位以外的位置，角色可以坐在那个位置上担任射击手。
If that character is not grounded or is otherwise insulated from the current, a successful save indicates that no damage is suffered.
如果角色不是接地的或者处于其他绝缘状况，豁免成功的结果是伤害完全免除。
If that leaves the character dangling over a chasm or gap, getting up requires a move action and a Climb check (DC 15).
如果角色因此悬挂在峡谷或壕沟边缘，爬上来需要一个移动动作来进行一次攀爬检定（DC15）。
If that square is occupied, the character falls prone in the square.
如果后退至的方格被占据了，角色将跌倒，进入俯卧状态。
If that’s the case, the character needs to make another check to defeat computer security.
如果有这个情况，角色需要再进行一次计算机使用检定破解文件的安全锁。

如果角色绊摔时自己反被绊倒了，角色可以扔掉锁链以避免。
If the character is tripped during his or her own trip attempt, the character can drop the weapon to avoid being tripped.
如果角色绊摔时自己反被绊倒了，角色可以扔掉武器以避免。
If the character is tripped during his or her own trip attempt, the character can drop the whip to avoid being tripped.
如果角色绊摔时自己反被绊倒了，角色可以扔掉鞭子以避免。
If the character is underwater (from failing a swim check or because the character is swimming underwater intentionally), the character must hold his or her breath.
若角色下沉（无论是游泳检定失败还是自行下沉），角色必须闭气。
If the character is using a double wea-pon, the character can strike with either part of the weapon first.
如果角色使用双头武器，首先使用哪一头先攻击都可以。
If the character is using two weapons, the character can strike with either weapon first.
如果角色使用双持武器，首先使用哪一把先攻击都可以。
If the character just wants to look at records, no additional check is needed.
如果角色只是想看看记录，则无需做额外的检定。
If the character loses, he or she fails to start the grapple.
如果角色失败，则擒抱失败。
If the character loses, the target may immediately react and make a Strength check opposed by the character’s Dexterity check or Strength check to try to trip the character.
如果角色落败，目标可以立即作出反应，并做一个力量检定与角色的敏捷或力量检定相对抗，以绊摔角色。
If the character makes a long jump, the character gains a +2 competence bonus on his or her Jump check.
角色跳远所进行的跳跃检定将获得2点表现加值。
If the character misses the target (whether aiming at a creature or a square), check to see where the weapon lands, using the rules for thrown explosives.
如果角色失手（无论瞄准的是生物还是方格），应当用投掷爆炸物的规则检定武器的最终落点。
If the character misses the target, the explosive lands at a corner of a square nearby in a random direction.
如果角色失手，爆炸物将落到弹跳方向所指的临近方格内。
If the character remains unconscious, he or she makes the same Fortitude save every hour until he or she becomes conscious.
如果角色仍旧昏迷，角色每小时都会进行强韧豁免直到恢复意识。
If the character spends the entire round to run all out, he or she can move up to four times his or her normal speed.
若角色以一个整轮动作`全力奔跑`，则可以移动四倍于速度的距离。
If the character starts a full-round action at the end of his or her turn, the next action that character takes must be to complete the full-round action.
如果角色在其回合末尾开始了一个整轮动作，角色的下一次行动必须为完成这个整轮动作。
If the character succeeds at that check, make the Craft check against the given DC for the object in question.
若财富检定成功，再进行制造检定对抗制造物品所要求的DC。
If the character succeeds at the Profession check, his or her Wealth bonus increases by +1.
如果角色的专业检定成功，其财富加值将+1。
If the character succeeds in tripping his or her opponent, the character can continue his or her movement as normal.
如果角色成功绊摔了对手，则可照常移动。
If the character succeeds on a Reflex saving throw (DC 10, +1 for each 10 feet fallen), this damage is halved.
如果角色进行反射豁免成功（DC10，每超过10尺+1），伤害减半。
If the character succeeds on the Wealth check, the character gains the object.
如果角色财富检定成功，角色获得物品。
If the character succeeds on the check, he or she can reach the height.
若角色检定成功，则可到达指定高度。
If the character succeeds on the check, he or she takes falling damage as if the character had dropped 10 fewer feet than he or she actually did.
若检定成功，角色的坠落伤害等效于从跳跃高度-10尺处坠落。
If the character succeeds on the check, the damage or the burst radius of the explosion increases by 50% (the character’s choice).
若检定成功，角色可选择增加50%伤害还是增加50%爆炸半径。
If the character succeeds, he or she can escape from being pinned.
如果角色成功，则能挣脱压制。
If the character succeeds, he or she can escape the grapple.
如果角色成功，则能挣脱擒抱。
If the character succeeds, he or she continues on to his or her destination; the total time for the trip is twice the normal time.
若角色成功，将继续移动到目的地，整个旅途花费的时间是正常情况的两倍。

If the character succeeds, he or she doesn’t actually damage the opponent—but the character’s friend gains either a +2 circumstance bonus against that opponent or a +2 circumstance bonus to Defense against that opponent (aiding character’s choice) on the friend’s next turn.
若成功，角色虽然不会伤害到对手，但可选择为指定盟友对的攻击骰或防御提供2点情景加值，该加值仅在下一个该盟友的回合生效，且仅对指定的对手有效。
If the character succeeds, he or she is still grappling.
如果角色成功，将仍处于擒抱状态。
If the character succeeds, he or she may treat the target as friendly for 10 minutes, but only for purposes of actions taken while in the character’s presence.
若角色成功，则视为目标对其友善，持续10分钟，但这种友善只体现在对方做所要求做的事上，且角色必须一直在场。
If the character succeeds, he or she moves via the best reasonable course toward his or her goal.
如果检定成功，角色将走一条最合理的路线通往目标。
If the character succeeds, he or she uses only a move action, and the character can use his or her attack action to do something else.
若角色成功，则只需使用一个移动动作，角色可以使用攻击动作来做其他事。
If the character succeeds, his or her Wealth bonus is unaffected, even if the object’s purchase DC is higher than his or her Wealth bonus.
若检定成功，角色的财富加值不变，即使物品购买DC高于角色的财富加值也是如此。
If the character succeeds, his or her current Wealth bonus increases by +1.
如果检定成功，角色的财富加值加一。
If the character succeeds, proceed to step 3.
如果角色成功，则进入步骤3。
If the character succeeds, the character learns the site from which the intruder is operating (if it’s a single computer, the character learns the name of the computer’s owner).
如果角色对抗成功，角色将知晓入侵者自身所处的站点（如果是单个电脑，角色将知晓电脑所有者的名字）。
If the character succeeds, the disease has no effect on him or her—the character’s immune system fights off the infection.
如果角色成功，就不会感染——即角色的免疫系统抵御了疾病。
If the character succeeds, the evidence is usable by a crime lab.
若检定成功，该证据则可用于技术鉴定室分析。
If the character succeeds, the intruder’s session is ended.
如果角色成功，入侵者的会话结束。
If the character succeeds, the next attack the character makes against the target ignores his or her Dexterity bonus to Defense (if the opponent has one), thus lowering his or her Defense score.
如果角色成功，角色对对手的下一次攻击无视其敏捷加值（如果对手有），以此降低对手的防御值。
If the character succeeds, turn the other vehicle 90 degrees across the front of the character’s, so that they form a tee.
如果角色胜，则将目标载具旋转90度，横置在角色的载具前，两个载具形成一个T字。
If the character successfully purchases an object or service with a purchase DC that’s higher than his or her current Wealth bonus, the character’s Wealth bonus decreases.
如果角色成功购买一件物品或服务，但物品或服务的购买DC大于角色的财富加值，角色的财富加值会降低。
If the character takes an attack action or a full-round action, the amount of breath the character has remaining is reduced by 1 round.
如果角色做了攻击动作或整轮动作，角色剩余闭气时间要再减一轮。
If the character takes damage, he or she must make a Balance check again to remain standing.
如果角色承受伤害，角色必须再做一次平衡检定以保持站立。

If the character takes his or her readied action in the next round, before his or her regular turn comes up, the character’s initiative count rises to that new point in the order of battle, and he or she does not get your regular action that round.
如果角色进入了下一轮，且在自己回合开始前执行了准备的动作，角色的先攻值将调整至该处，并丧失该轮的行动机会。

If the character trips an opponent in melee combat, the character immediately gets to make a melee attack against that opponent as if the character had not used his or her attack action for the trip attempt.
如果角色在近战中成功绊摔对手，角色可立即对对手进行一次额外的近战攻击，就如同你没有使用过这次攻击来绊摔一样。
If the character wants to discover a specific fact, date, map, or similar bit of information, add +5 to +15 to the DC.
如果角色想要发现专门的事实、日期、地图或者类似的信息，DC要加5至15。
If the character was armed, the target’s weapon is on the ground at the target’s feet.
如果角色以武器卸除武器，目标的武器或落到目标脚下的方格上。
If the character wears armor, it provides a bonus to the character’s Defense.
角色穿着护甲也能提供防御加值。
If the character wins, he or she trips the target.
如果角色胜出，将绊摔对手。
If the character wishes to pull him or herself up, the character can do so with a move action and a Climb check (DC 15).
如果角色要爬上来，则需要一个移动动作来进行一次攀爬检定（DC15）。
If the character’s Dexterity is high, the character is particularly adept at dodging blows or gunfire.
高敏捷意味着角色能熟练地闪避击打和枪械射击。
If the character’s Dexterity is low, the character is particularly inept at it.
低敏捷则意味着角色在这方面十分笨拙。
If the character’s attack succeeds, the ranged weapon falls to the ground or winds up in the character’s hands (if the character made the attack unarmed).
如果角色的攻击成功，远程武器将落在地上，或者被角色夺取（如果角色是徒手攻击）。
If the character’s check fails by 5 or more, the character misinterprets the message in some fashion.
若角色失败5点及以上，角色会误会此信息。
If the character’s check result beats the DC by 5 or more, the character understands the secret message as well.
若角色检定结果成功大于等于5点，角色能准确理解弦外之音。
If the character’s current Wealth bonus is equal to or greater than the DC, the character automatically succeeds.
如果角色当前财富加值大于等于购买DC，自动视为购买成功。
If the character’s hit points are already below that score at that time, all the temporary hit points have already been lost, and the character’s hit point total does not drop.
当角色生命值已低于那个值，所有的暂时生命值都被耗完，角色的生命值就不会再降。
If the character’s speed is greater than 30 feet, he or she gains a bonus of +4 for every 10 feet over 30.
若角色速度高于30尺，每比30尺多10尺都要受到4点加值。
If the character’s speed is less than 30 feet, he or she takes a penalty of –6 for every 10 feet of speed less than 30.
若角色速度低于30尺，每比30尺低10尺都要受到6点减值。
If the check fails by 4 or less, the character has failed but can try again.
若检定失败4点及以下，角色失败但可重试。
If the check fails by 5 or more, the explosive compound detonates as it is being made, dealing half of its intended damage to the builder and anyone else in the burst radius.
如果检定失败，结果低于DC5点及以上，爆炸化合物将会视为成品爆炸物爆炸，对制造者和爆炸半径内的其他人产生成品爆炸物一半的伤害。
If the check fails, the GM makes a Wisdom check (DC 10) for the character to see if he or she avoids drawing a false conclusion about the text.
若检定失败，GM将为角色做一次感知检定（DC10），决定角色的解读是否得出了错误的结论。
If the check fails, the action automatically fails and is wasted.
检定失败，该动作自动失败并浪费掉。
If the check fails, the raw materials are used up but the XP are not spent.
若检定失败，将消耗原材料，但不会消耗经验值。
If the check fails, you pay the power point cost and the power manifests.
若检定失败，则照常消耗灵力点释放此灵力。
If the check is failed by 5 or more, the security system immediately alerts its administrator that there has been an unauthorized entry.
如果检定失败，低于DC5点甚至更多，安全系统会立即警报通知管理员有非法入侵。
If the check is successful, the animal performs the task or trick on its next action.
如果检定成功，动物的下一个动作就是完成这个工作或技巧。

If the check succeeds, for the rest of the combat the Smart hero uses his or her Intelligence bonus instead of either Strength or Dexterity bonus on attack rolls as the hero finds ways to outthink his opponent and notices weaknesses in his opponent’s fighting style.
若成功，智力型英雄在接下来的战斗用智力加值代替力量或敏捷加值结算攻击骰，当作是英雄脑子转得比对手快并抓住了对手战斗的破绽。
If the check succeeds, the character disables the device.
如果检定成功，角色解除此设备。
If the check succeeds, the character understands the general content of a piece of writing, reading about one page of text or its equivalent in 1 minute.
如果检定成功，角色将能理解一页纸或一分钟能读完的内容。
If the check succeeds, the character’s ally gains a +2 circumstance bonus to apply to his or her skill check to complete the task.
如果检定成功，角色的盟友完成此任务的技能检定获得2点情景加值。
If the check succeeds, the dead character can make a Fortitude save (DC 15) to stabilize and be restored to 0 hit points.
若检定成功，死亡角色进行一次强韧豁免（DC15）以稳定并直接恢复至0生命。
If the check succeeds, the dead character can make a Fortitude save (DC 20) to stabilize and be restored to 1d6 hit points.
若检定成功，死亡角色进行一次强韧豁免（DC20）以稳定并直接恢复至1d6点生命。
If the check succeeds, the effect of the improvement lasts for a number of minutes equal to his or her Techie class level, beginning when the object is first put into use.
若检定成功，提升效果从提升后第一次使用开始计算，持续等同于技师等级的分钟数。
If the check succeeds, the final product is a solid material, about the size of a brick.
若检定成功，最终产品是一个固态的，砖头大小的爆炸化合物。
If the check succeeds, treat the fall as if it were 10 feet shorter when determining damage.
若检定成功，结算伤害的等效坠落高度减少10尺。
If the check succeeds, you can attempt the action without incurring any attacks of opportunity.
若检定成功，就可以如此释放灵力，避免所有的借机攻击。
If the check succeeds, you can attempt the casting without incurring any attacks of opportunity.
若检定成功，就可以如此施法，避免所有的借机攻击。
If the check succeeds, you may continue with the action as normal.
检定成功则如常继续该动作。
If the climb is less than 10 feet, reduce the DC by 5.
如果攀爬低于10尺，DC-5。
If the covering character has a Dex-terity bonus to Defense or a dodge bonus, and this bonus keeps the covering character from being hit, then the original target is hit in-stead.
若提供掩蔽的角色的防御有敏捷加值或有闪避加值，且此加值正好让角色免于被命中，则原目标将承受伤害。
If the creature also has the improved grab ability (see below), it deals constriction damage in addition to damage dealt by the weapon used to grab.
如果生物精通攫抓能力（见下文），则会在攫抓所用武器造成的伤害之外额外造成紧勒的伤害。
If the creature can attack, it applies its Dexterity modifier to its base attack instead of a Strength modifier.
若该生物可以攻击，则使用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值计算基础攻击。
If the creature does not constrict, each successful grapple check it makes during successive rounds automatically deals the damage given for the attack that established the hold.
如果生物不紧勒，在每轮的擒抱检定中，每次成功的擒抱检定将造成最初缠握时所造成的伤害。
If the damage equals or exceeds the target’s massive damage threshold, the target must make a Fortitude save (DC 15).
如果伤害大于等于目标的巨创阈值，目标必须进行强韧豁免判定（DC15）。
If the defender survives the damage, he or she still must make a Fortitude save (DC 10 + damage dealt) or die.
若防御方在受到伤害后仍存活，防御方仍然必须做一次强韧豁免（DC10+造成的伤害），失败则死亡。
If the device is monitored, the fact that the character attempted to disable it will probably be noticed.
如果设备被监控了，角色试图解除装置将可能被发现。
If the eavesdropper beats the DC by 5 or more, he or she understands the secret message.
如果成功结果成功大于等于5点，偷听者将会破译密信。
If the encounter involves both vehicles and characters on foot, use character scale.
如果遭遇战是涉及载具与徒步的角色的，应用角色尺度。
If the entangling bonds are anchored to an immobile object, the entangled hero can’t move.
如果纠缠是绑定在固定的物体上，被纠缠的英雄将无法移动。
If the examiner’s check result is equal to or higher than the original Forgery check, the document is determined to be fraudulent.
如果检查者的检定结果大于等于原伪造文书检定结果，伪造将被识破。

If the expenditure of these XP would drop the Techie to below the minimum needed for his or her current level, then the XP can’t be paid and the Techie can’t use the mastercraft ability until he or she gains enough additional XP to remain at his or her current level after the expenditure is made.
如果消耗的经验值让剩余经验不足以满足技师当前职业等级所需，则无法消耗经验值，此制造过程不可进行，只有消耗经验而不降级才可制造大师级工艺。

If the game setting includes magic or other supernatural effects, there can also be deflection, enhancement, enlargement, haste, inherent, insight, luck, profane, resistance, and sacred bonus descriptors.
如果游戏设定包括了魔法或者其他超自然效果，还将包括偏斜、增强、巨化、加速、固有、洞见、运气、亵渎、抗力、神圣这些加值学名。
If the grapple succeeds, the attacker can choose to deal normal unarmed damage as well as choke the target.
如果擒抱成功，攻击者可以选择空手攻击或者使对方窒息。
If the hero fails to show up, the agency loses the bail loan, and may send bounty hunters or other thugs after the character.
如果英雄未按时出庭，“欠条”将成为坏账，有关部门会派出赏金猎人或其他打手向角色追索。
If the hero succeeds in the check, he or she gains a +2 bonus on the Diplomacy check.
若英雄检定成功，交涉检定将获得2点加值。
If the initial check fails, the other character has become more firmly resolved to resist the intimidator, and trying again is futile.
如果首次检定失败，对方会更坚定地抗拒威吓，重试也是没用的。
If the initial check fails, the other character has probably become more firmly committed to his or her position, and trying again is futile.
如果首次检定失败，对方可能会更加坚定自己的立场，所以重试是无用的。
If the off-hand weapon is light, the penalties are reduced by 2 each.
如果副手武器是轻武器，两只手的攻击减值都要少2点。
If the opponent avoids the character, the character keeps moving.
如果目标避开了角色，角色将继续移动。
If the opponent fails to disarm, the character does not get a free disarm attempt against the opponent.
如果目标的这次尝试缴械失败，角色将无法获得免费的缴械的机会。
If the opponent is upwind, the range increases to 60 feet; if downwind, it drops to 15 feet.
如果对手在上风处，距离增加至60尺，在下风处，距离减至15尺。

If the power of the strongest Shadow aura is “overwhelming,” and has a rating of at least twice the Shadow Slayer’s character level, the Slayer is stunned for 1 round and the use of this ability ends.
如果最强暗影的`气场强度`是“凌厉”，并且`能级`大于等于暗影猎手角色等级的两倍，暗影猎手将陷入震慑状态1轮并中止感应。
If the result equals or beats the target’s Defense, the character hits and deals damage.
若结果大于等于对方的防御值，则角色命中并造成伤害。
If the result equals or exceeds the creature’s power resistance, the power works normally, although the creature is still allowed a saving throw.
若检定结果大于等于生物的灵能抗力，灵力照常生效，但生物仍可以掷豁免骰。
If the result equals or exceeds the creature’s spell resistance, the spell works normally, although the creature is still allowed a saving throw.
若检定结果大于等于生物的法术抗力，法术照常生效，但生物仍可以掷豁免骰。
If the result of the d20 roll + the Modifiers equals or exceeds the Target Number, the test is successful.
若 `d20投骰+调整值` 数值大于等于`目标值`，则判定为事件成功，
If the save fails by 10 or more, and the object is at least three size categories larger than the character, the character is pinned under the fallen object.
如果豁免失败，相比DC低10点甚至更低，并且物体尺寸比角色尺寸至少大3级，角色会被压制在坠落物之下。
If the save fails, the character loses 1 hit point and must make another save on his or her turn the next round.
如果豁免失败，角色失去1点生命，并且下一轮在角色的回合必须再进行一次这样的豁免。
If the save fails, the character remains unconscious.
如果豁免失败，角色仍保持昏迷状态。
If the save fails, the opponent stops fighting.
豁免失败，则停战。
If the save fails, the target becomes dazed (unable to act, but can defend normally) for 1 round.
如果豁免失败，目标会陷入眩晕1轮（无法行动，但可保护自己）。
If the save fails, the target receives a –1 penalty on attack rolls, ability checks, skill checks, and saving throws for a number of rounds equal to the character’s Charismatic level.
若豁免失败，目标会在等同于施放者魅力等级的轮数内，攻击骰、属性检定、豁免骰都获得一点减值。
If the save succeeds, he or she takes only half damage.
若成功通过该豁免，英雄只受一半伤害。
If the save succeeds, the Shadow creature doesn’t disappear but is instead stunned for 1d4+1 rounds.
若豁免成功，此暗影生物不会消失，但会震慑1d4+1轮。
If the save succeeds, the character becomes stable.
如果豁免成功，角色进入稳定状态。
If the save succeeds, the character suffers no ill effect beyond the loss of hit points.
如果豁免成功，角色只会扣除相应的生命值。
If the save succeeds, the opponent continues as normal.
豁免成功则如常行动。
If the save succeeds, the stable character regains consciousness, becoming disabled (see above).
如果豁免成功，稳定的角色会恢复意识，变为瘫痪（见上文）。
If the saving throw fails, full damage is applied.
失败则受到完全的伤害。
If the saving throw fails, the hero becomes the target’s sole focus.
豁免失败，英雄将成功吸引目标的注意。
If the saving throw fails, the target becomes dazed (unable to act, but can defend normally) for 1 round.
如果豁免失败，目标会陷入眩晕1轮（无法行动，但可保护自己）。
If the scene involves only vehicles, and they’re likely to move at much higher speeds than characters or creatures on foot, use chase scale.
如果这是只有载具的场景，且载具的移动速度远高于角色或生物的徒步移动，则应用追逐尺度。
If the second roll also results in a hit against the target’s Defense, the attack is a critical hit.
如果第二次攻击骰与目标的防御值对抗的结果为`命中`，则此次攻击为一次重击。
If the site alerts the character to an intruder, the character can attempt to cut off the intruder’s access (end the intruder’s session), or even to identify the intruder.
如果站点警告有人入侵，角色可以试图切断入侵者的访问（结束入侵者的会话），甚至可以识别入侵者的身份。
If the site being hacked is not connected to the Internet, this is probably the only way a character can access it.
如果要黑入的站点不与互联网相连，这可能就是角色访问此站点的唯一办法。
If the situation doesn’t require the expenditure of money, no Wealth check is necessary.
若信息不需要花钱购买，就没必要进行财富检定。
If the situation permits, the character can make additional checks as long as he or she is not being actively opposed.
如果情况允许，只要角色的脱逃不是在与对手正面对抗，则可重试。
If the skill selected is already a class skill for the character, he or she also gains a one-time competence bonus for that skill.
若所选技能已经是角色的本职技能，则角色获得该技能的一个一次性的表现加值。
If the space is long, such as in an airshaft, the GM may call for multiple checks.
如果空间狭长，比如在通风竖井内，GM要做多次检定。
If the spell has a duration other than instantaneous, the spell stops affecting the familiar if the creature moves farther than 5 feet away.
如果法术是持续的而非瞬时的，当魔宠处于5尺以外时，作用在魔宠上的法术将失效。
If the square is within one range increment, you do not need to make an attack roll.
如果方格在一射程跨度内，则无需掷攻击骰。

If the stake is higher than the character’s Wealth bonus (before applying any reductions from purchasing the stake), the character gets a +1 bonus on his or her Gamble check for every point the purchase DC is above the character’s Wealth bonus.
若赌注高于角色的财富加值（购买赌注之前的值），每超过1点，角色的赌博检定就获得1点加值。
If the stake is within the character’s means (it is equal to or less than his or her Wealth bonus), the character stands no chance of winning any significant amount.
若赌注只是角色的九牛一毛（小于等于角色的财富加值），角色是没有机会赢得任何可观的奖励的。

If the subject is worried about being followed, he or she can make a Spot check (opposed by the character’s Hide check) every time he or she changes course (goes around a street corner, exits a building, and so on).
如果目标担心被跟踪，可以在每次切换地域（转过一个街角、离开建筑等等）时进行一次侦察检定（与角色的躲藏检定对抗）。
If the swallowed opponent chooses the latter course, success puts it back in the creature’s mouth, where it may be bitten or swallowed again.
如果被吞噬者选择后者，脱逃成功将会回到吞噬者的嘴里，可能会在此遭到啮咬或吞噬。

If the target fails the save, his or her attitude toward the other designated character worsens by one step: helpful turns to friendly, friendly to indifferent, indifferent to unfriendly, unfriendly to hostile (see the Diplomacy skill).
豁免失败，被挑拨的目标对指定角色的态度下降一级：提供帮助到友善、友善到不关心、不关心到不友善、不友善到敌对（见交涉技能）。
If the target fails, he or she is knocked unconscious for 1d4+1 rounds.
如果检定失败，目标会昏迷1d4+1轮。
If the target fails, he or she reacts to the emotion as described below.
如果豁免失败，目标将如下述规则产生情绪效果。

If the target is already grappling someone else, a character can use an attack to start a grapple, as above, except that the target doesn’t get an attack of opportunity against the character, and the character’s grab automatically succeeds.
如果目标正在擒抱他人，角色可以用一个攻击动作发动擒抱，步骤如上文，但目标不会有对角色的借机攻击，而且角色的攫抓阶段自动成功。

If the target is in combat or some other tense situation, and therefore in a state of acute awareness and readiness, or if the target can use his or her Dexterity bonus to Defense, then that target can’t be considered unaware.
如果目标处于战斗中或其他紧张的情况，且因此处于紧张的警觉与待命状态，或者目标处于可在防御中应用敏捷加值的情形，则目标不可被视为未觉察。
If the target is so big that part of it is 10 feet or farther from the nearest ally, the character can avoid the –4 penalty, even if it’s engaged in melee with an ally.
如果目标过于庞大，目标的一些部位与最近的盟友的距离大于等于10尺，角色可射击此处于近战的敌人且不用承受4点减值。
If the target is using a weapon in two hands, he or she gets an additional +4 bonus.
如果目标使用双手武器，还会再获得4点加值。
If the target square is more than one range increment away, make an attack roll.
如果方格在1射程跨度外，则需要掷攻击骰。
If the target succeeds at the saving throw, he or she is immune to the compulsion of this performance.
如果目标豁免成功，将免疫此表演的蛊惑。
If the target succeeds on the save, the target is dazed for 1 round.
如果目标豁免成功，目标晕眩一轮。
If the target took 10 on his or her Sleight of Hand check, use this formula:
如果目标在手上功夫检定中取10，使用以下公式：

If the target’s Sense Motive check succeeds by 11 or more, he has seen through the bluff, and would have succeeded in doing so even if it had not placed any demand on him (that is, even without the +10 bonus).
如果目标察言观色检定结果高于唬骗11以及更多，目标则是看穿了唬骗，唬骗者还未提任何要求就被拒绝了（也就是没有那10点加值，目标也成功了）。
If the threat is confirmed, a weapon deals double damage on a critical hit (roll damage twice, as if hitting the target two times).
重击威胁发生时，武器重击，造成两次伤害（即掷伤害骰两次，视为两次击中目标）。
If the treating character’s check succeeds, the character provides a bonus on the poisoned character’s saving throw equal to his or her ranks in this skill.
若医疗者检定成功，将为患者的豁免骰提供一个加值，加值等于医疗者的医疗等级。
If the treating character’s check succeeds, the treating character provides a bonus on the diseased character’s saving throw equal to his or her ranks in this skill.
若医疗者检定成功，将为患者的豁免骰提供一个加值，加值等于医疗者的医疗等级。
If the trigger is part of another character’s actions, the readied action interrupts the other character.
如果触发条件是其他角色的动作，该准备动作将打断目标角色的动作。
If the turning check result is equal to or greater than the turning check result that the good Acolyte scored when turning them, then the creatures are no longer turned.
如果检定结果大于等于善良侍僧的驱散检定结果，被驱散生物将脱离被驱散状态。
If the use of a skill carries no penalty for failure, a character can take 20 and assume that he or she keeps trying until he or she eventually succeeds.
如果一些技能的使用没有失败惩罚，角色可以`取20`，表示不断尝试直到成功。
If the weapon is held in two hands, it gets a +2 bonus to its Defense.
如果武器是双手握持的，防御将获得2点加值。
If the weapon was thrown two to three range increments (11 to 30 feet), roll 1d8.
如果武器被投掷到2到3射程跨度内（11到30尺），掷1d8。
If the weapons are different sizes, the combatant with the larger weapon gets a bonus on the attack roll of +4 per difference in size category.
如果武器的尺寸不同，武器大的一方的攻击骰检定会获得每尺寸等级差距+4的加值。
If the weight of a character’s gear falls in his or her heavy load range, the character is considered heavily encumbered.
如果角色负重处于重度负载区间，角色被视为处于`重度负载`状态。

If the weight of everything a character is wearing or carrying amounts to no more than his or her light load figure, the character can move and perform any actions normally (though the character’s speed might already be slowed by the armor he or she is wearing).
如果角色穿着或承载的所有物品总重量不超过其轻度负载，角色可正常移动和做任何动作（但角色会被护甲的减速属性所减速）。
If the weight of the character’s gear falls in his or her medium load range, the character is considered encumbered.
如果角色负重处于中度负载区间，角色被视为处于`累赘`状态。
If there is no danger associated with failing, the character can take 20.
若失败结果没有危险，可取20。
If there is no particular drawback to not possessing the feat, this entry is absent.
如果不具有此专长的人物不会有特定的劣势，则本项缺省。
If there is still a tie, roll a die.
如果还是相同，相同的人物再掷一次骰决出他们的先后。
If they do not make attacks of opportunity, trampled opponents can attempt Reflex saves for half damage.
如果不想进行借机攻击，被践踏者可以进行反射豁免以让伤害减半。

If this entry doesn’t appear, it means the skill works the same even when used untrained, or that an untrained character can’t make checks with this skill (true for skills that are designated “Trained Only”).
如果没有这一项，即表示技能是否受训效果都是一样的，或者是不允许未受训就使用（如果技能标明了“需受训”）。
If this entry is omitted, the skill check can be tried again without any inherent penalty other than taking additional time.
如果没有这一项，重试技能检定除了需要再花时间外没有任何固有惩罚。
If this is not the case, the DC for the jump is doubled.
如果条件未满足，DC加倍。
If this weapon if fully-loaded, a character can fire both barrels at once.
此武器装满弹药后，可以一次将两个枪管的弹药同时发射。
If those scores are the same, roll again.
如果仍相同，则再投掷一遍。
If tools are needed, the specific items required are mentioned in the skill description.
如果技能需要工具，技能描述会提到需要哪些物品。

If two or more combatants have the same initiative check result, the combatants who are tied go in order of total initiative modifier (including Dexterity modifier and Improved Initiative bonus, if applicable).
如果两个或者更多的作战者有相同的先攻值，那么有较高总先攻调整值（包括敏捷调整值和可能有的精通先攻加值）的作战者先行动。
If two or more delaying characters are trying to go after one another, the one with the highest initiative modifier gets to go last; the others must go first or lose their action for the round.
如果多个角色想在其他人之后行动，先攻调整值最高者优先靠后，其他人若不行动则视为放弃该行动机会。
If two or more delaying characters both want to act on the same initiative count, the one with the highest initiative modifier gets to go first.
如果多个角色都想要在同一个先攻值行动，先攻调整值最高的角色先行动。
If unsuccessful, the character chooses the wrong path, but at the next juncture, with a successful check, the character realizes his or her mistake.
如果不成功，角色则选错了路，但在下一个岔路口，角色会意识到自己选错了。
If while withdrawing, the character moves through another threatened square (other than the one started in) without stopping, enemies get attacks of opportunity as normal.
角色如果在撤退时经过另一个威胁方格（起点以外的威胁方格）而没有停止移动，敌人可以照常借机攻击。
If you already have a high enough score in the ability, you don’t need to make this check.
如果你的属性值已经满足，就不需要检定。
If you are using the check to emulate some quality in an ongoing manner, you need to make the checks once per hour.
如果你要持续地模拟一些特性，你需要每小时都做一次检定。
If you do perform the strenuous action after failing the check, you take 1 point of damage, as normal.
若在检定失败后做费力动作，你将照常承受1点伤害。
If you don’t have a sufficiently high score, you must emulate the ability score with a separate check (see above).
如果你的属性值不够，你需要另外做一个检定，把属性值模仿出来（见上文）。
If you lost a power, the power is lost.
丧失了正在释放的灵力，就真的丧失了。
If you lost a spell, the spell is lost.
丧失了正在施展的法术，就真的丧失了。
If you succeed at the ability check, the power manifests with no cost in power points.
若属性检定成功，则可无消耗释放此灵力。
If you were concentrating on an active power, the power ends.
如果正在维持对一个已启动灵力的专注，如同你停止对其专注一样，该灵力停止。
If you were concentrating on an active spell, the spell ends.
如果正在维持对一个已启动法术的专注，如同你停止对其专注一样，该法术停止。
If you were in the process of casting a spell, the spell is lost.
如果是在施法途中，该法术丧失。
If you were in the process of manifesting a power, the power is lost.
如果是在释放灵力途中，该灵力丧失。
If “Trained Only” is omitted, the skill can be used untrained.
如果没有“需受训”，这个技能就可以直接使用。
Illegal: The object is illegal in all but specific, highly regulated circumstances.
非法：物品在极其特殊和高度管制的情况下才能使用，否则皆为非法。

Illustrators, copywriters, cartoonists, graphic artists, novelists, magazine columnists, actors, sculptors, game designers, musicians, screenwriters, photographers, and web designers all fall under this occupation.
插画师、文案写手、卡通画师、图形艺术家、小说家、杂志专栏作家、演员、雕塑师、游戏设计师、音乐家、剧作家、摄影师以及网页设计师都属于这一类。
Immunities: Objects are immune to nonlethal damage and to critical hits.
免疫：物品免疫非致命攻击与重击。
Imprinting a tattoo takes one day.
刻印文身需要1天的时间。
Impromptu armor includes items that provide protection even though they weren’t designed for that purpose, such as leather biker’s jackets and football pads.
临时护甲包括那些能提供防护作用，但本不是为防止伤害而设计的护具，比如机车皮衣、橄榄球护具。
Improved evasion can only be used when wearing light armor or no armor.
精通反射闪避只有在穿着轻甲或无甲时生效。
Improvised weapons of Fine size deal no damage.
超微型的临时武器不会造成伤害。
Improvised weapons threaten a critical hit on a natural roll of 20.
临时武器的重击威胁区间仅为20。
In a dramatic situation, the target is compelled to fight, regardless of the danger.
在一些戏剧化的情境中，目标会无视危险，强行进入战斗。
In a hospital setting, the necessary treat Injury checks are always successful.
在医院的环境，必要的医疗检定必定成功。
In a melee, if a character has cover against an opponent, that opponent probably has cover against the character, too.
在近战战斗中，若角色对对方有掩蔽，对方对角色也会有相同的掩蔽。

In a normal round, a character can perform an attack action and a move action (or two move actions; a character can always take a move action in place of an attack action), or a character can perform a full-round action.
在一个正常轮内，角色可以做一个攻击动作和一个移动动作（或两个移动动作；角色总是可以将移动动作代替攻击动作），或者做一个整轮动作。
In addition to its own armament, the Bradley’s passenger compartment has ports that allow passengers to fire their personal weapons from within the vehicle.
除了自带的武器外，布雷德利的乘员位上都有射击口，乘员可用自己的武器在车内向外射击。

In addition to keeping a character warm and dry, coats and jackets provide additional concealment for things a character is carrying (they often qualify as loose or bulky clothing; see Concealed Weapons and Objects).
外套和夹克除了能让角色保持温暖干爽，还能让角色更方便地隐藏物品（通常取决于衣服的宽松程度，见隐藏的武器与物品）。

In addition to the Wealth bonus increase a character gains from your Profession check result (if the check succeeds), the number of ranks the character has in this skill increases his or her Wealth bonus as follows.
除了财富检定结果提升的财富加值（如果检定成功），角色拥有的此专业级数将按如下表增加财富加值。
In addition to the Wealth check, the Techie must also pay a cost in experience points equal to 25 x his or her Techie level x the bonus provided by the mastercraft feature.
除了要进行财富检定，技师必须消耗掉经验值，需消耗经验值=25×技师等级×大师级工艺特性提供的加值。
In addition to the costs derived from the base price, you must expend the material component or pay the XP when scribing the scroll.
除了基本价格的支出外，抄录卷轴必须额外花费法术所需的材料费用以及经验。
In addition to the nor-mal requirements for attempting a sideswipe stunt, the character must have sufficient movement re-maining to move a number of squares equal to the character’s turn number.
除了要满足侧击特技的一般要求外，角色必须保持移动等于`转向距离`的方格数。

In addition to the normal hit point recovery rate (1d4 for a medical kit, 1d6 per patient’s character level for surgery), the Field Medic restores 1 hit point for every level he or she has in this advanced class.
在一般的生命值恢复率基础上（有医疗箱1d4，病人每级角色等级1d6），每级战地医生等级额外恢复1点生命值。
In addition to the raw materials cost, the Mage must expend the material component or pay the XP when creating the potion.
除了基本价格的支出外，调制药水必须额外花费法术所需的材料费用以及经验。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Charismatic hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，魅力型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Dedicated hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，感知型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Fast hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，敏捷型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Smart hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，智力型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Strong hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，力量型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition to the two feats all characters get at 1st level, a Tough hero begins play with the Simple Weapons Proficiency feat.
除了所有角色在1级时获得的两个专长，体质型英雄初始拥有`擅长简单武器`专长。
In addition, a Battle Mind can use psionics while wearing armor without risking the failure of the power.
另外，灵战士可以穿着护甲使用灵能，护甲不会增加释放灵能的失败风险。
In addition, a Battle Mind must have a key ability score equal to at least 10 + the power’s level to manifest a particular power.
而且，灵战士必须具备关键的属性值才能释放对应的灵力，所需的属性值为10+灵力等级。
In addition, a Telepath can use psionics while wearing armor without risking the failure of the power.
另外，异能者可以穿着护甲使用灵能，护甲不会增加释放灵能的失败风险。
In addition, a Telepath must have a key ability score equal to at least 10 + the power’s level to manifest a particular power.
而且，异能者必须具备关键的属性值才能释放对应的灵力，所需的属性值为10+灵力等级。
In addition, a WP grenade creates a cloud of smoke.
另外，白磷弹是会生成烟雾的。
In addition, a character can make attacks of opportunity with unarmed attacks if the character’s unarmed attacks count as armed (see “Armed” Unarmed Attacks).
此外，如果角色的徒手攻击算作非徒手，角色也可以徒手进行借机攻击。
In addition, a character can use this skill to make an assessment of a social situation.
此外，角色可以使用此技能评估社交氛围。
In addition, a number of the civilian vehicles covered above, such as the AM General Hummer and the Bell Model 212 helicopter, are commonly seen in military service.
此外，许多之前提到的民用载具，比如悍马和贝尔212型直升机，也在军中服役。
In addition, attempting trick riding or asking the animal to perform an unusual technique also requires a check.
此外，使用骑乘特技或者要求动物表演特殊的技巧也需要骑术检定。
In addition, the Acolyte receives bonus spells based on her Wisdom score.
而且，这个次数根据侍僧的感知有所增加。
In addition, the Mage receives bonus spells based on his Intelligence score.
而且，这个次数根据法师的智力有所增加。
In addition, the character takes a –2 penalty to Defense.
此外，角色防御时有2点减值。
In addition, the character takes a –2 penalty to his or her Defense.
此外，角色的防御有两点减值。

角色伪造文件需要此前见过类似的文件。

单兵口粮是概称，实际表现为具体的商品。

需受训。

为通用工作训练动物需要的检定比教会动物单独的技巧少。

被践踏者可以进行借机攻击，但有4点减值。

这类大卡车通常可以租赁。

Two actions can provoke attacks of opportunity: moving out of a threatened square, and performing an action within a threatened square that distracts from defending and lets the character’s guard down.
两种动作会引发借机攻击：移动出威胁的方格，以及做会让角色疏于防御的动作。
Two characters are engaged in melee if they are enemies and they are adjacent to one another.
处于近战意即两个角色互为敌对且相邻。

以下两种情景对唬骗不利：唬骗本身可信度低，或者唬骗行为要求目标做违背自己的利益、天性、个性或者命令的事。
Two successful saving throws in a row indicate that the character has fought off the disease and recovers, taking no more damage.
连续两次成功的豁免则使角色战胜疾病，不再受到伤害。
Two turbofans, set on the fuselage above and behind the wings, provide the power.
由安装在机身上方、机翼后方的双发涡轮提供动力。
Types of actions define how long activities take to perform within the framework of a combat round (6 seconds) and how movement is treated with respect to the activity.
动作的类型定义了在战斗轮（6秒）的框架内要花多长时间来做，以及该动作视为多少移动距离。

标准DC如下所示，但GM会酌情调整。

Typical of the assault rifles used by militaries around the world, the Colt M16A2 is the current service rifle of the United States military, and is common with other armies and in the civilian world.
柯尔特M16A2是遍布世界的军队标配，它既是美国军队的标配步枪，也普遍地被其他国家的军队所使用。
Typically, a belt holds 50 bullets; any number of belts can be clipped together.
通常一条弹链装载50发子弹，多条弹链可连接起来。
Typically, a forger has 1 to 4 ranks in the Forgery skill, with a +1 ability modifier.
通常伪造文书技能为1到4级的伪造者会有+1的属性调整值。
Unable to act, a dazed character can take no actions, but still gets the benefit of his or her normal Defense.
眩晕的角色无法行动，但仍能获得正常防御的增益。
Unarmed Strike Damage: An unarmed strike from a Medium-size character deals 1d3 points (plus the character’s Strength modifier, as normal) of nonlethal damage.
徒手击打伤害：普通体型角色的徒手击打会造成1d3点（还要像往常一样加上角色的力量调整值）非致命伤害。
Unarmed attacks normally provoke attacks of opportunity, and unarmed combatants cannot normally make attacks of opportunity.
徒手攻击一般都会引发对手借机攻击，且不能进行借机攻击。
Unarmed strikes count as light melee weapons (for purposes of two-weapon attack penalties and so on).
徒手击打算作用轻近战武器攻击（为了应用双持武器惩罚等效果）。
Unaware combatants are still flat-footed because they have not acted yet.
未觉察的作战者仍是措手不及的，因为他们还没有行动。
Unconscious characters go underwater and immediately begin to drown.
昏迷的角色将下沉并立即溺水。
Unconsciousness lasts for 1d3 hours, and paralysis lasts 2d6 minutes.
昏迷持续1d3小时，麻痹持续2d6分钟。
Unfriendly Character: There are two ways to move through a square occupied by a resisting enemy.
不友善角色：有两种方法可以越过拦路敌人占据的方格。

Uniform: From the cable guy to a senior Air Force officer, people on the job tend to wear uniforms—making such clothing an essential part of some disguises, since a uniform inclines people to trust the wearer.
制服：从接线员到高级空军军官，工作中的人都会穿制服——制服作为基本的标识，提醒这人们要信任穿制服的人。
Unless noted otherwise, the opponent can be up to one size category smaller than the swallowing creature.
除非另有说明，活吞只能作用于体型比自己小一级以及更小的对手。
Unless otherwise noted, another saving throw is required 1 minute later (regardless of the first save’s result) to avoid secondary damage.
除非另有说明，1分钟后（不管初次豁免成功与否）需再次进行豁免检定抵抗再次伤害。

Unless otherwise noted, civilian cars provide three-quarters cover for their occupants (although passengers who lean out of windows or sunroofs, perhaps to fire weapons, may be reduced to one-half or even one-quarter cover).
除非特别说明，民用汽车为乘客提供3/4掩蔽（但如果在乘客伸出窗外或天窗，还有面对火焰武器的情况下，只会提供半掩蔽甚至1/4掩蔽）。
Unless otherwise noted, each of these options is equivalent to an attack.
除非另有说明，以下每个行为都等同于攻击。
Unless otherwise specified, the multiplier is x2.
除非特别说明，倍增值为2。
Unless otherwise stated, improved grab works only against opponents at least one size category smaller than the creature.
除非另有说明，精通攫抓只能作用于体型比自己小一级以及更小的对手。
Unless the activity increased the character’s hit points, the character is now at –1 hit points, and is dying.
除非该动作增加了角色的生命值，角色的生命值将变为-1，是濒死状态。
Unless the effort is particularly elaborate or the character must acquire an expensive piece of equipment, the basic components have a purchase DC of 5.
除非创作极其耗费心血或者工作需要用昂贵工具完成，基础的创作材料的购买DC只有5。
Unlike arcane spellcasters, Battle Minds don’t have spellbooks and they don’t prepare powers ahead of time.
不像秘法的施法者，灵战士没有法术书，也不需要事先准备“法术”。
Unlike arcane spellcasters, Telepaths don’t have spellbooks and they don’t prepare powers ahead of time.
不像秘法的施法者，异能者没有法术书，也不需要事先准备“法术”。
Unlike box magazines, cylinders can’t be removed, and they must be reloaded by hand.
不像弹匣，转轮不能随便拆卸，必需手动装填。
Unlike getting into a car, mounting a motorcycle is a free action.
与进入汽车不同，骑上摩托车是一个即时动作。
Unlike heroes, ordinaries do not automatically receive maximum hit points at 1st level.
与英雄不同的是，1级时路人的最大生命值不取骰点的最大值。
Unlike heroes, ordinary characters do not receive action points.
与英雄不同的是，路人不会获得行动点。
Unlike most sorts of bonuses, dodge bonuses stack with each other.
同大多数加值不同，闪避加值可以相互叠加。
Unlike real weapons, improvised weapons are not designed to absorb damage.
不像真武器，临时武器不能吸收伤害。
Unlike with attack rolls and saving throws, a natural roll of 20 on the d20 is not an automatic success when making a skill check, and a natural roll of 1 is not an automatic failure.
不像攻击骰或豁免骰，技能检定投20不会直接判定为成功，投1也不会直接判定为失败。
Unlike with characters, when dealing with vehicles, the vehicle’s facing (the direction it’s pointing) is important.
不像角色间的战斗，计算载具的战斗时，载具的朝向也很重要。
Up to four combatants can grapple a single opponent in a given round.
一轮内，至多允许4个擒抱者擒抱同一个目标。

更新许可证：威世智或者它指派的代理人会出版该许可证的更新版本。

5级时，战地科学家已经在其领域为科学研究取得微小的进展，受到同行的尊重。
